attributes.action: Grant the award of the Victoria Cross to Colonel Blair Maine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1945 Field Marshall Montgomery recommended the award of the VC to Col Blair Maine for actions around Oldenburg, Germany. The award progressed and even King George thought it had been awarded. It was suddenly downgraded to a DSO. We petition the PM to reinstate the award and name those responsible for downgrading that award.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
